Title: Authorizes school districts that provide transition services to allow the delivery of such transition services, including integrated employment, during school hours
Summary: Authorizes school districts that provide transition services to allow the delivery of such transition services, including integrated employment, during school hours.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to authorizing school districts that provide transition services to allow the delivery of such transition services, including integrated employment, during school hours
